catalogue_description: Hebrew and Judaica Manuscripts at the Bodleian Libraries, Oxford University
title: Miscellany
author: Ezobi, Jehoseph ben Hanan ben Nathan
description: Contents: Book of Psalms (ff. 2r-102v). Ibn Gabirol, Keter Malkhut (ff. 103r-123r). Jedaiah ben Abraham Bedersi, Beḥinat ʿolam (The Examination of the World) (ff. 123v-163r). Jehoseph ben Hanan ben Nathan Ezobi, Ḳeʿarat ha-kesef (ff. 163v-173v). Moses ben Isaac da Rieti, Miḳdash meʿaṭ (Meʻon ha-shoʼalim) (ff. 177r-185v).
